description: Construction of a rear dormer roof extension and insertion of 2no. front conservation-style rooflights. Installation of cooling outdoor unit with acoustic enclosure to ground floor courtyard.
decision_conditions:
<p style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:4.15pt;margin-left:
0cm"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, &quot;sans-serif&quot;;">The external materials to be used for the proposed
development shall match those specified in the application form.<o:p></o:p></span></p><p>

</p><p style="margin: 0cm 0cm 4.15pt;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, &quot;sans-serif&quot;;">REASON: In order to ensure a satisfactory appearance
for the proposed development, to safeguard the visual amenity of neighbouring
properties and the appearance of the locality consistent with Policies D1, D3,
D4 &amp; HC1 of the London Plan 2021 &amp; Policies LP1, LP2, LP3 &amp; LP17 of
the Hackney Local Plan 2020.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.
